creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: organic vertical form/column with flat back, covered in orange, yellow, white, black, and gold tesserae; triangle and diamond forms and stripes; black metal tube-shaped base
medium: Mosaic tesserae, Japanese shell, concrete, and steel
text: The upward motion of this dynamic sculpture was Jeanne Reynal's homage to royalty and tradition. She studied African art and met makers on the continent, incorporating her understanding of symbolic colors and forms to the mosaic work she mastered as a modern artist.
title: Africa: King and Queen
